thread.title: Patti Anderson
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Patti Anderson

author: Patti Anderson
title: Patti Anderson
text: We ordered the wax jacket on the Thursday just after Christmas and in all honesty expected to receive it at some point the following week. The jacket was ready to be delivered the next day (which was a little too soon as we had put a work address down to have it delivered to!) However, son went to depot to collect it in the end.
